availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Fayette County, Kentucky, hack driver. Married to Charlotte Taylor. Father of John H. Taylor, James Taylor, George Taylor, William Taylor, and Robert S. Taylor. Resident of Fayette County, Kentucky, in 1840. Hack driver in Fayette County in 1850.

ab.bibl:
Sixth Manuscript Census of the United States (1840), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fayette County, Lexington, p. 97.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fayette County, District 2, p. 198A-B.
KYR-0001-004-0453.
